description.narrative: The overall objective of the program is to support decentralized delivery of basic services in Sierra Leone and the PDO for the second phase remains unchanged: i.e. to (i) strengthen the Recipient’s capacity to manage decentralized services; (ii) improve availability and predictability of funding for Local Councils (LCs); and (iii) strengthen the Recipients inter-governmental fiscal transfer system.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Local Government & Rural Development

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Disbursement Condition . | Description :for payments under Category (1) or (2.1) (of the Financing Agreement)for a sub-project, unless the Recipient has furnished to the Association, evidence satisfactory to the Association, that: (i) theRecipient has concluded a Subsidiary Agreement with the LC (or MDA) for such sub-project under terms and conditions satisfactory tothe Association; and (ii) in the case of a sub-project to be carried | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Disbursement Condition | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than four (4) months after the EffectiveDate, recruit an independent external auditor, in accordance with Section III of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Frequency:Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Disbursement Condition. | Description :Notwithstanding the provisions of Part A of Section IV of the FinancingAgreement, no withdrawal shall be made:(a) for payments made prior to the date of the Financing Agreement; (b) until theRecipient has prepared and approved, the Consolidated Project AnnualWork Plan and Budget for the first year of projectimplementation, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Effectiveness Condition . | Description :The Grant Agreement has been executed and delivered and all conditionsprecedent to its effectiveness or to the right of the Recipient to make withdrawals under it (other than the effectiveness of theFinancing Agreement) have been fulfilled. | Due Date :29-Nov-2013

Finance Agreement :Effectiveness Condition. | Description :The Recipient has prepared and approved, in form and substanceacceptable to the Association, a time bound action plan to integratethe Decentralization Secretariat into MLGRD. | Due Date:29-Nov-2013

title.narrative: LCs’ M&E Units receive, process, and transmit (to relevant stakeholders) data related to sector activities.
LCs producing annual updates on the implementation progress of the development plans.
Direct project beneficiaries (% of which is Female)
LCs with at least 50% female representation in Ward Committees
LCs that have Jan.-Dec. budget execution rates of 90 percent of available funds.
LCs receiving timely transfers (received within the quarter) from the Consolidated Revenue Fund (GoSL budget).
LCs receiving transfers from DSDP within each quarter
LCs with integrated development plans and budgets (finalized in accordance with sector plans).
LCs with procurement plans (which include LC transfers and DSDP funds)
Citizens satisfied with service delivery in key sectors
Domestic revenues transferred to LCs on an annual basis, excluding DSDP funds
LCs with CLoGPAS social accountability aggregate score over 60
Ward Committees performing spot checks on service providers (in education, health and sanitation, rural water, social assistance services)
Community monitoring mechanisms in four LCs in four sectors established.
Disaggregated list of DSDP-related investments by type and/or sector.
Transfer of funds to LCs as a percentage of total GoSL expenditures
